sourcesContent:
Shipping Policy

Fast, reliable shipping to get your fashion finds delivered safely to your door.

1-3 Day Processing
Secure Packaging
Real-time Tracking

Choose Your Shipping Speed

Select the delivery option that works best for your schedule

Standard Shipping

5-7 Business Days
$4.99 for orders under $50
FREE for orders over $50
  • Reliable delivery
  • Package tracking
  • Insurance included
Most Popular

Express Shipping

2-3 Business Days
$9.99 flat rate
  • Priority handling
  • Enhanced tracking
  • Expedited processing

Next Day Delivery

Next Business Day
$14.99 flat rate
Order before 2 PM EST
  • Lightning fast delivery
  • Signature required
  • Premium packaging

Processing Time

All orders are processed within 1-3 business days after receiving your order confirmation email. You will receive another notification when your order has shipped.

Order Placed

You receive confirmation email

Processing

1-3 business days

Shipped

Tracking information sent

Shipping Locations

We currently ship to all 50 United States and select international destinations.

United States

All 50 states including Alaska and Hawaii

  • Standard rates apply
  • Free shipping over $50
  • Express options available

International

Select countries worldwide

  • Custom shipping rates
  • Extended delivery times
  • Contact support for details

Order Tracking

Track your order every step of the way with our comprehensive tracking system.

Email Tracking

Click the tracking link in your shipping confirmation email

Account Dashboard

Log into your Thrifto account and view your order history

Customer Service

Contact our team with your order number for assistance

Track Your Order

Enter your order number to get real-time tracking updates.

Shipping Questions?

shipping@thrifto.com
+40 773 309 702
Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 6 PM EEST
